  • Uses of GrantedAuthorityFactory in waffle.spring

    Classes in waffle.spring that implement GrantedAuthorityFactory
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    FqnGrantedAuthorityFactory
    A GrantedAuthorityFactory that uses the WindowsAccount's fqn as the basis of the GrantedAuthority string, and (optionally) applies two transformations: prepending a prefix, and converting to uppercase .
    Fields in waffle.spring declared as GrantedAuthorityFactory
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final GrantedAuthorityFactory
    WindowsAuthenticationToken.DEFAULT_GRANTED_AUTHORITY_FACTORY
    The GrantedAuthorityFactory that is used by default if a custom one is not specified.
